com.informatica.mdm.userexit

Class UserExitContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informatica.mdm.userexit.UserExitContext

  • public class UserExitContext
extends Object
    Represents the hub context that is passed to the user exit interfaces. This is a placeholder for data that is applicable to all user exits.

    • Constructor Summary
